As the new bot steps out it goes straight to the Catz base.As its on 
its way there it sees Lioconvoy heading to greet Lynxiz.He talks to 
Lioconvoy saying that he would like to join the Catz but would like 
to talk to the leader.He asks Lioconvoy if he can go with him to 
greet this Lynxiz character andLioconvoy says sure you can come with 
me.So he and Lioconvoy walk to greet Lynixz.They see Lynxiz sitting 
by a tree.So they rush to greet him.As they are running Lioconvoy 
suddenly realizes who the strange bot is.They get to the tree and  
start talking to Lynxiz and they say are you ready to go to the base 
and talk to Panthero?
